sections.title: Lexington 250
sections.description: The flagship town for History Is For Everyone, celebrating Lexington's role in the American Revolution.

sections.label: Intention
sections.text: Create the definitive digital resource for Lexington's 250th anniversary.

sections.label: What I did
items: Curated and wrote content about Lexington's Revolutionary history
Built local business and event discovery features
Created itineraries for visitors and families

sections.label: What surprised me
sections.text: The depth of local enthusiasm for their town's history when presented in an engaging way.
